channel.title: Jippii edited client?
channel.description:
Hello, some of you may know, others may not know, the site jippii , it is a games site with the main engine (chat + games) in java.
The following site has all the classfiles, and as far as i can see they are not obfuscated.
[url=http://mobile.computerjunkie.nl/jippii/]http://mobile.computerjunkie.nl/jippii/[/url]
i talked with some of the mods on the dutch jippii site, and as far as i could make up of what they were saying, the !kick and !ban commands are all client side, so basically you should be able to make yourself an mod. I do not have enough experience to code something like that myself, maybe someone else here has? ;)
Nlboy

item.title: Jippii edited client?

item.title: Jippii edited client?
item.dc:creator: @nlboy nlboy
item.description:
@nlboy wrote:

actually the language in the code is finnish (suomi) cause thats where jippii originates from. There are locale files though --> points at source.
